Title: WPF Membership API Management Studio
Description: A lightweight WPF UI wrapper around the ASP.NET membership API for managing users and roles.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A lightweight WPF UI wrapper around the ASP.NET membership API for managing users and roles.

Main Features

  • Add Roles
  • Remove Roles
  • Add New Users
  • Remove Users
  • Manager User Role Memberships
  • Retrieve User Passwords
  • Reset User Passwords

Tools

  • Generate User Passwords
  • Generate Aspnet_RegSql command
  • Generate an SQL Script of all user / role mappings
